main event: A round, white object, approximately 20 inches in diameter, was sighted by a control operator at Tocumen Tower at 1935Z on October 6, 1957.
interesting points: The object was sighted 23 degrees above the horizon., The sighting lasted approximately 1 minute., The object was reported to be trailing slowly., The report questioned whether it was a weather balloon or an aircraft., The sighting was confirmed to be Venus by TWX from Panama Canal Zone.
witness description: control operator at Tocumen International Airport
